pixie.cson.content:
title: "Jadelet - Truly Outrageous Templating!"
description: """
  Jadelet is simple, powerful, and truly outrageous reactive templating. By
  making use of native DOM APIs Jadelet provides the cleanest and smallest 
  runtime at only 2.7k gzipped. Check it out and have it blow your mind.
"""
dependencies:
  analytics: "distri/google-analytics:master"

templates/main.jadelet.content:
content
  header
    h1 Jadelet
    p Truly outrageous templates!
  section
    h2 A match made in heaven
    p Jadelet is literally a dream come true!
    p Coming soon...
  section
    = @signupForm

main.coffee.content:
style = document.createElement "style"
style.innerHTML = require "./style"
document.head.appendChild style

require("analytics").init('UA-3464282-17')

Template = require "./templates/main"

document.body.appendChild Template
  signupForm: require "./lib/mailchimp"

style.styl.content:
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Roboto')

*
  box-sizing: border-box

/* Palette generated by Material Palette - materialpalette.com/pink/light-blue */

primary-color-dark =   #C2185B
primary-color =        #E91E63
primary-color-light =  #F8BBD0
primary-color-text =   #FFFFFF
accent-color =         #03A9F4
primary-text-color =   #212121
secondary-text-color = #757575
divider-color =        #BDBDBD

body
  font-family: "Roboto", "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, sans-serif
  font-size: 16px
  color: primary-text-color
  margin: 0

  > content
    display: block
    padding: 0 2em

    > header
      background-color: primary-color
      color: primary-color-text
      margin: 0 -2em
      padding: 1em 2em

h1, h2
  font-weight: 300
  margin: 1rem 0

form
  max-width: 400px

label
  display: block

input[type="text"], input[type="email"]
  display: block
  font-size: inherit
  margin-bottom: 1em
  width: 100%

lib/mailchimp.coffee.content:
module.exports = -> div = document.createElement "div" div.innerHTML = """

Subscribe to our mailing list

""" return div

pixie.content: module.exports = {"title":"Jadelet - Truly Outrageous Templating!","description":"Jadelet is simple, powerful, and truly outrageous reactive templating. By\nmaking use of native DOM APIs Jadelet provides the cleanest and smallest \nruntime at only 2.7k gzipped. Check it out and have it blow your mind.","dependencies":{"analytics":"distri/google-analytics:master"}};

lib/mailchimp.content:
(function() { module.exports = function() { var div; div = document.createElement("div"); div.innerHTML = "

Subscribe to our mailing list

"; return div; }; }).call(this);

config.title: Jadelet - Truly Outrageous Templating!
config.description:
Jadelet is simple, powerful, and truly outrageous reactive templating. By
making use of native DOM APIs Jadelet provides the cleanest and smallest 
runtime at only 2.7k gzipped. Check it out and have it blow your mind.

README.md.content:
google-analytics
================

Google analytics for distri apps

main.coffee.content:
module.exports =
  init: (id) ->
    require "./lib/analytics"

    global.ga('create', id, 'auto')
    global.ga('send', 'pageview')

test/main.coffee.content:
mocha.globals("ga")

describe "analytics", ->
  it "should put analytics on the page", ->
    GA = require "../main"

    GA.init("UA-XXXX-Y")

  it "should be a chill bro", ->
    ga("send", "duder")
